alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:01PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT METEOR CRATER IN COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM MST... At 500 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meteor Crater, or 16 miles west of Winslow, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Sunset Mesa, Meteor Crater, and Meteor Crater Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
